text: Norman Joel Greenbaum (born November 20, 1942) is an American singer- songwriter, known for his 1969â€“1970 hit song "Spirit in the Sky". The song made him one of the most famous acts with a best-selling one-hit wonder for all time. ==See also== *The Remains *Billy Squier *Matthew Wilder *The Click Five Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American singer- songwriters
